title: Science Education Design Based on Video Conferencing: Long-Term Course for Integrating Expert Experience

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners participate in video conferences via personal mobile devices, with an emphasis on real-life applications of scientific topics.

learning_goals: Learners can produce 5-minute microlearning content explaining scientific concepts using video conferencing tools.
Learners can perform peer idea-sharing activities at least three times using real-time collaboration tools during video conferences.
Learners can analyze science case studies provided in virtual environments and present real-life application strategies with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
